website_summaries.verdict: A welcome addition to the growing Running System sneaker line is the Puma RS-0 Sound. This running-inspired casual shoe is offered in a variety of colorways that could cater to many customers.The design and color combination allow it to be utilized for a plethora of casual events, holiday strolls, or everyday chores. With its remarkable support and a sports-style vibe, opting for the Puma RS-0 Sound is as agreeable as it gets.
pros: Most of the reviewers have attested that the Puma RS-0 Sound delivers ample comfort
The colorways appear to be very pleasing as there are some who expressed buying multiple pairs in different colors
Considering its bulky appearance, this shoe from Puma has been light on feet for several wearers
Its support and overall fit have been impressive, others noted
On their Puma RS-0 Sound review, many users recommended the shoe to their friends and loved ones because of the overall features
The insole provides a good amount of cushioning, especially at the ankle area, one satisfied purchaser advised
According to a reviewer, the RS-0 Sound by Puma is wearable on many occasions, which confirms its versatility
For a sneaker fanatic, the color blocking matches well with the footwear’s design
cons: Durability is questioned by a few users as noticeable signs of wear and tear has already manifested after wearing it regularly for a couple of weeks
Cleaning the low-top may not be as simple, as per a customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable & stylish
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these sneakers. I bought these searching for comfort, as well as, style. As a bartender, I’m always on the lookout for a comfortable (all day) sneaker, as I’m on my feet long hours and these definitely provide that. Great cushioning, bounce, and style. I will say that Puma’s run about a 1/2- 1 size smaller than most brands. I can usually wear a 7-7 1/2 in men’s sneakers (9 in women’s) but after buying a 7 1/2 I had to exchange them for the 8 men’s.

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Rs-0 Sound Sneaker
product_meta.description: Back in 1987 PUMA launched the breakthrough running system - RS. Since then, this franchise has evolved, eventually entering the world of casual wear. In 2018, PUMA gives the RS a re-invention makeover with a totally new model that lives in the future and yet resembles its past. - running system technology midsole - elastic sock construction - rubber heel feature
